analysis.description: KSTToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/4/0x4cdcef47af71b7225f703ed566dc68af4480ceba.sol#313-319) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0x4cdcef47af71b7225f703ed566dc68af4480ceba.sol:
	Contract KSTToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x4cdcef47af71b7225f703ed566dc68af4480ceba.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

KSTToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/4/0x4cdcef47af71b7225f703ed566dc68af4480ceba.sol#289-293) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/4/0x4cdcef47af71b7225f703ed566dc68af4480ceba.sol#292)

KSTToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/4/0x4cdcef47af71b7225f703ed566dc68af4480ceba.sol#313-319)
	- /unique_chucks/4/0x4cdcef47af71b7225f703ed566dc68af4480ceba.sol#318-319
